question: As per report titled "2018 World Economic League Table", India to become 5th largest economy in 2018. The report is published by which international organisation?
option2: Centre for Economics and Business Research (CEBR)
option3: United Nations Conference on Trade and Development (UNCTAD)
answer: Centre for Economics and Business Research (CEBR)
explanation: As per recently released report \" 2018 World Economic League Table\", India will overtake the United Kingdom and France in 2018 to become the worldâ€™s fifth-largest economy in terms of the United States dollar. The report was published by the Centre for Economics and Business Research (CEBR), an economics consultancy based in Britain. The report also stated that Asian economies will dominate the list of the top ten largest economies over the next 15 years.
